info.task: navigate to previous colum in grid
info.title: Navigate to the previous column in a grid

setupScript.name: setFocusOnSecondDataCell
setupScript.description: sets focus on the second cell of the second row in the grid

user: Navigate to the previous column in the grid.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the previous column in the grid.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Text of the column header ('Date') is conveyed
Text of the cell ('01-Jan-16') is conveyed
coordinates of the cell (column 1, row 2) are conveyed
